function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High frequency of visits to green spaces during pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases spreading","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures, maintain social distancing, and increase sanitation efforts","Technologies":"Crowd-monitoring technologies and smart sanitation systems","People":"Residents and visitors to the green spaces","Owner":"Local authorities and park management"},{"Description":"Lack of proximity to green spaces as a primary factor in Krakow","Impact":"Limited access to nature and potential negative impact on mental and physical well-being","Mitigation":"Develop more green spaces in residential areas and improve transportation to existing green spaces","Technologies":"Urban planning and transportation infrastructure improvements","People":"Local government, urban planners, and residents","Owner":"Local authorities and city planners"},{"Description":"Recognition of green spaces as essential infrastructure for well-being","Impact":"Increased dependence on green spaces for mental and physical health, especially during pandemics","Mitigation":"Invest in maintaining and expanding green spaces, promote public awareness of the importance of green spaces, and provide equitable access to all residents","Technologies":"Green space monitoring and maintenance technology, public awareness campaigns","People":"Residents of Krakow","Owner":"Local government and community organizations"}]}
